prompt: Vibrant hot pink solid background. Centered, full-bleed 4:5 portrait composition filled edge-to-edge with a bold, playful cartoon vector illustration and matching typography. Main scene: an exuberant bearded fisherman in an angler vest and hat catching a large smiling leaping fish on a curved fishing line; fisherman holds a frothy beer mug; pond reeds, cattails, stylized sun and circular water ripples form a compact scene that touches and extends to the canvas edges. All graphic elements and all text are isolated and HAVE A THICK BLACK VECTOR-STYLE OUTLINE AROUND THE ISOLATED ELEMENTS ONLY; do NOT add a square frame or border around the entire image. Color palette: saturated greens and yellows for the fish, warm skin tones, rich browns and khaki for clothing, bright sky blues for water and highlights, vivid accent oranges and cream for details; keep outlines pure black and add crisp white highlights. Typography: bold rounded display type, chunky playful letterforms with a slight arched baseline to fit the scene; letters use bright turquoise-to-sky-blue fills with white inner shine and the same thick black outline as the graphics so text reads as integrated art. TEXT Hungarian: "CSAK EGY KAPÁS" (above) "VÁLASZT EL A BOLDOGSÁGTÓL" (below). Composition: large, sticker-like elements crop to the edges, dynamic overlaps, no large empty margins, no small centered stamp — design feels full, bold and immersive. Print-ready clean vector style, flat color areas, minimal texture, crisp paths suitable for screen printing or vinyl. Isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows, no photographic elements. --ar 4:5
negative_prompt: no mockup, no garment, no fabric, no models, no shadows, no photographic textures, no frames, no background scenery beyond the described pond elements, no photorealism, no watercolor, no noise, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting

debug.extracted_text_raw: Top line: CSAK EGY KAPÁS ; Bottom line: VÁLASZT EL A BOLDOGSÁGTÓL
debug.notes: Both lines read clearly in the image; bottom phrase is a standard Hungarian phrase meaning 'separates you from happiness' and matches the visible letters exactly.
